website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the simple design fool you. This wooden muddler is strong and highly effective.
pros: Each of these handmade acacia wood muddlers has a unique, rustic look
Muddler feels heavy and durable with a smooth finish
The shape of the handle fits perfectly in the palm of your hand
Comes with a quality canvas storage bag
cons: Muddler must be cleaned immediately after use to prevent liquid and scent from seeping into the wood

customer_reviews.title: The finish could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's not smooth and has knots/gaps that will trap particles. This one shouldn't have passed QA.
customer_reviews.author: jg151

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I did an online cocktail class, and one of the things the teacher said was to avoid the muddlers with the pointed ends, as they will bruise the herbs. . My son brought his over for that class, and it was one that had those points. I had been thinking about buying one so after that class I looked and found this. We tried the same cocktail using this one, and I can see why this is preferable. May not matter for fruit, but if you use mint/basil for cocktails, this is better. It's also really pretty, and it comes with a bag that protects it. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.Pete

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Item!
customer_reviews.text: A very beautifully made muddler! The wood is good quality, and it has an easy to grip shape. The simple decorative carving is quite pretty too. It easily fits into a shaker or tall Collins glass with room too spare. It arrived on time, and comes in a neat rustic cloth bag with a nice image of the muddler on it. This is the kind of muddler you can leave on your home bar without people thinking you’re cheap or that you’re muddling their cocktails with a “marital aid.”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A stylish answer to a simple tool
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that this works any better than the piece of hardwood dowel I cut and have used for the last 10 years as a muddler, but it looks a whole lot better doing it.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, good price
customer_reviews.text: Solid muddler for the price. Looks great on the shelf. Some specimens development cracks if not maintained with oil. Functions well as a muddler. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this muddler! It's beautiful, nice and smooth, and works as a muddler should! Obviously you have to take care of it correctly because it is made of wood so as long as you clean it off immediately and allow it to fully dry before putting it away it'll last you a long time. I've had mine for six months or so and it's been wonderful. Also love the little canvas case it comes in!
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great size muddler
customer_reviews.text: Very Goldie locks size muddler . The one I got was a lot more rustic than the one in the pictures but I kind of liked that so I can’t complain. I also liked that it doesn’t have any wax or varnish to get in your drink (why it looks rustic probably). Plus the wood is neutral in taste so no popsicle stick flavor going into the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Functional and elegant design, beautiful wood. Some of the other reviewers were disappointed so maybe there's an issue of inconsistent quality but mine was perfect. I suggest rubbing it with oil made for kitchen wood so it doesn't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Functions well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great muddler to use when making an old fashioned. Its attractive and looks good in the bar area. I apply coconut or olive oil to it occasionally which preserves and brings out the wood grain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice, but very rough. Just feels like it is desperate need of a sanding to make it comfortable to hold. Otherwise this works great and looks pretty nice
customer_reviews.author: Tristen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love this muddler so much bought for a gift for a friend and they’re obsessed too. Easy to use and clean. Doesn’t scratch your glasses if you want to muddle in them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wood - Made In USA
customer_reviews.text: When selecting a muddler I wanted wood as it won't damage glass such as if you accidentally clink it against the glass. This is acacia tree wood which has an interesting pattern, each piece must look unique. This is made in USA. It works great, rated 5 stars = I Love It.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineMM

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to muddle cocktails. He absolutely loves it and prefers it to the metal version.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Autler

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: It showed up cracked and I'm pretty sure the stain used, if any, left run marks.
customer_reviews.author: LetsGoWVU

customer_reviews.title: I think an exotic place is best. I think a homemade place is also very ...
customer_reviews.text: I think an exotic place is best. I think a homemade place is also very good for the feel of a material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, cloth pouch is a plus.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for most tall glasses. Rounded end for muddling ingredients works well. Smooth finish on the wood with no additional chemical coating to contaminate mix.
customer_reviews.author: Justanopinion

customer_reviews.title: The bag that it is stored in was cut at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The bag the it is stored in is cute at the bottom please ship a new bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the home bartender
customer_reviews.text: It’s made of wood so hopefully will hold up long term but does the trick for muddling sugar cubes for cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T. Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of wood and solid!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Wanted wood over metal for looks and I’m so glad I choose this one! It’s beautiful and highly functional!!
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it’s a little pale and dry out looking. Will keep but it’s not the most pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: fantastic muddler. I use it to make Hungarian lemonade
customer_reviews.text: fantastic muddler. I use it to make Hungarian lemonade, and specifically bought a wooden muddler so as to not damage my glass pitcher. Works perfectly, washes easily, and looks great after wiping down with oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well when making all sorts of different cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole J.

customer_reviews.title: faded and needs sanding
customer_reviews.text: product was faded, or not stained thoroughly. Also parts are poorly sanded and edges of the wood design are not sharp
customer_reviews.author: C. Giffin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, successfully muddled my mint. I didn't even realize it came with a bag!
customer_reviews.author: William Nash

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the muddler you want! Great quality, great shape!
customer_reviews.author: oddoye@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Perfect muddler
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect...just what I was looking for...quality wood...I've been looking for a while now
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Really good muddler for home bar
customer_reviews.text: As described, this muddler is beautiful looking. It is made of high quality wood. Do not put it in the dishwasher, you may need to use oil every now and then to maintain the wood. It is long and sturdy enough to muddle fruits in your drinks. I would highly recommend this muddler for a home bar.
customer_reviews.author: NewOwnerofStuff

customer_reviews.title: I have used this a few times now and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times now and have zero complaints. I read that you want a muddled without lacquer and this one doesn't have any. Has a little more style points than the others on amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: I thought a Muddler was a race horse
customer_reviews.text: Super nice muddler. I bought the perfect one i was looking for. The only minor dissapointment was that it's made in China. I know, even though the company that distributes it is in the US, the person that made it on the lathe is in China and according to DT, that person that made it should be an American so I would have paid $20 instead of nine bucks :)
customer_reviews.author: US_Buyer_Seller

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good product. Finish is very inconsistent and wood is raw in some spots. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok option for the price. I wanted a raw wood muddler around 8"-9" and this fit the bill. The wood is a tad rough, specifically around the 3 bevels and the wood is lighter and less pretty in person. It has ok hand comfort but isnt super great with muddling fruit wedges. Maybe i got used to the teeth on metal/nylon muddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bartender
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes cocktails for a living as well as for fun. This muddler not only looks great but perfect for constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Kdsuite

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Muddler
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this muddler. It's great for releasing the essence in herbs and berries. Thank you for an honest transaction and a quality product
customer_reviews.author: NEA Sound

customer_reviews.title: So handy
customer_reviews.text: Attractive muddler with nice wood grain. It seems to like it's job - it muddles up a storm!
customer_reviews.author: Fornancy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Easy to hold. Isn't cracked. I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty muddler. I will never need another one.
customer_reviews.author: R F H

customer_reviews.title: Expected a better product
customer_reviews.text: Wood is rough and chipped in places. Expected a better product
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Dan

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. I feel deceived. Whole reason I bought it was because I thought It was made in USA. Looks to be sturdy. Not worth the hassle of sending it back though. It will work nicely but If you are trying to get a USA made one look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Max Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should do. The bottom has just the right degree of abrasiveness to be effective without over-muddling.
customer_reviews.author: J. MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Great home bar tool.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Love the storage bag that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Ann Foster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little weak but like that there is no gloss
customer_reviews.author: JODIE Y.

product_meta.title: Twine Acacia Muddler Bar Accessory and Cocktail Drinkware Tool, Kitchen Essential with Jute Storage Pouch, Set of 1, Wood Grain
product_meta.description: Crush limes and mint for juleps, or play with berries, citrus, herbs and spices to craft classic cocktails or your own creations. Use the beech hardwood muddler to unlock the full flavor of any ingredient you require. Handcrafted from Beachwood. Designed in Seattle, WA. Hand wash only. Comes in canvas pouch.
feature_bullets: UNLOCK THE FULL FLAVOR OF YOUR COCKTAIL INGREDIENTS - A reliable muddler is an essential part of any home bar. Iconic cocktail recipes require muddled ingredients. You want a muddler that matches the quality of your cocktails.
CRUSH CITRUS, HERBS, BERRIES, SPICES AND MORE - Muddle lime for mojitos, mint for juleps, and experiment with a huge range of other ingredients to create wonderful craft cocktails.
CRAFT CLASSIC COCKTAILS AND INVENT YOUR OWN CREATIONS - This quality wooden muddler will let you learn bartending basics and master classic recipes, before coming up with your own creations.
BEAUTIFUL WOOD GRAIN AND SHAPING WILL COMPLEMENT ANY BAR - Find some space for this wood muddler on your home bar cart. This bar tool matches a wide range of home bar decor
COMES WITH BURLAP STORAGE POUCH - Easily store this bar tool in your kitchen. Measures 8.75 inches long. Hand wash only

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars277 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
